Frontend.name: JavaScript
Frontend.info: Javascript is a programming language I have used in every web application project and can confidently say I'm well experienced using it. The reason for this rating is because Javascript is so vast and there is a lot more to learn

Frontend.name: React
Frontend.info: I have used React for several projects and have almost no problems when using the language.

Frontend.name: React Native
Frontend.info: I am familiar using React Native for creating mobile. Next to this React Native and React also share similarities of which im confident I will pick up on.

Frontend.name: Vue.js
Frontend.info: I have used Vue.js to create many different school projects. I've also learned to write front-end testcases using Vue jest and use frameworks such as Vuetify to create a better UX.

Frontend.name: Tailwind CSS
Frontend.info: Using Tailwind CSS I was able to make this portfolio website more reactive and polished. Next to this I've used Tailwind a couple of times and during other projects and understand the basics

Frontend.name: Bootstrap
Frontend.info: The bootstrap framework is something I've mostly used in projects before I studied in the HvA. I am familiar with the framework but have not used it in a long time.
